title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Universal Pre Filter 3/8″ 200HP / 30micron Kit – Fuel Manager Separator FM707DPK

content.rendered:
Universal 3/8″ Fuel Filter Water Separator Kit
From Fuel Manager – Diesel 200HP / 30 micron

Filters down to 30 Micron, excellent to use as a Pre Filter on any Modern Diesel Engine up to 220 HP. This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water & contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality.

Kit FM707DPK Includes :
Fuel Water Separator unit with Plastic bowl
and integrated drain tap.
2 x 9.5mm (3/8”) Barbed fittings.
2 x Blocks for universal fitting options
(There are 4 Ports in the head.)
1 x Metre of 9.5mm (3/8”) Fuel Hose.
2 x Hose Clamps
2 x Nuts & Bolts and washers for mounting
Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

Dimensions :
Length: 240mm
Width:105mm
Deep: 115mm

We also have available to suit this unit a 12 Volt water sensor kit with wiring harness and dash light to advise when you have water in the bowl. (See separate listing !)

Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste.
